channel.title: Number of Blue Dragon/Neutrals/Black Rose spawning
channel.description: Let's assume 15 players. King, 8 Blue Dragon, 2 deadly neutrals, 2 other Neutrals, 2 Black Rose. Day 2:King, 4 Blue Dragon, 2 deadly Neutrals,2 other Neutrals, 3 Black Rose.(Worst case)(Nightshade) Terrible idea. King, 8 Blue Dragon, 1 deadly Neutral, 2 other Neutrals, 3 Black Rose(1 already converted role) Day2:King, 5 Blue Dragon, 1 deadly Neutral, 2 other Neutrals, 3 Black Rose(Worst case)(Nightshade) Also terrible. King, 10 Blue Dragon, 1 deadly Neutral, 1 other Neutral, 2 Black Rose. Day2:King, 6 Blue Dragon, 1 deadly Neutral, 1 other Neutral, 3 Black Rose(Worst case)( Nightshade spent) Now assume that King is Black Rose. Blue Dragon is dead even then. How to balance **this**? King, 11 Blue Dragon, 1 other Neutral, 2 Black Rose. Day2: King, 8 Blue Dragon, 2 other Neutral, 3 Black Rose(Worst case of enemy sucess. Nightshade spent) Assuming King as evil, that is already 8v6, so this might be the only remotely balanced 15 player situation. Conclusion: There really need to be more than 15 players if you want deadly Neutrals to spawn.
